name: OR_CASE_3
description: The OR_CASE_3 table enables you to report on surgical and procedural case data. This table has the same basic structure as OR_CASE and OR_CASE_2, but was created as a second table to prevent OR_CASE and OR_CASE_2 from getting any larger.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the case request record.

columns.name: SETUP_TIME_MOD_YN
columns.description: This item tracks whether the setup time for a case has been modified by the user.
entries: No
Yes

columns.name: DFLT_SETUP_MINS
columns.description: This item stores the setup time defaulted by the system.

columns.name: DFLT_CLEANUP_MINS
columns.description: This item stores the clean up time defaulted by the system.

columns.name: DFLT_PREP_MINS
columns.description: This item stores the patient prep time defaulted by the system.

columns.name: DFLT_WRAPUP_MINS
columns.description: This item stores the wrap-up time defaulted by the system.

columns.name: CLEANUP_TIME_MOD_YN
columns.description: This item tracks whether the clean up time for a case has been modified by the user.

columns.name: WRAPUP_TIME_MOD_YN
columns.description: This item tracks whether the wrap-up time for a case has been modified by the user.

columns.name: CASE_LEN_MOD_YN
columns.description: This item indicates whether the length of a procedure or panel has been modified by a user.

columns.name: LEN_MOD_USER_ID
columns.description: This item tracks the last user to modify a length of a procedure or panel such that a length doesn't use the defaulted length.

columns.name: LEN_MOD_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PAN1_PAN_DLFT_SNG_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there is only a single procedure in this panel.
entries: Match procedure, provider, and location.
Match procedure and provider; all locations.
Match procedure and location; all providers.
Match procedure; all locations and providers.
Match procedure, provider, and location. Include multiple procedure cases.
Match procedure and provider; all locations. Include multiple procedure cases.
Match procedure and location; all providers. Include multiple procedure cases.
Match procedure; all locations and providers. Include multiple procedure cases.
Use time when performed with other procedures from preference card.
Use time when performed as a single procedure from preference card.

columns.name: PAN1_PAN_DLFT_MLT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there are multiple procedures on this panel.
entries: Match procedure combination, provider, and location.
Match procedure combination and provider; all locations.
Match procedure combination and location; all providers.
Match procedure combination; All locations and providers.
Match procedure combination, provider, and location. Include multi-panel cases.
Match procedure combination and provider; all locations. Include multi-panel cases.
Match procedure combination and location; all providers. Include multi-panel cases.
Match procedure combination; All locations and providers. Include multi-panel cases.
Use individual procedures. Match provider and location.
Use individual procedures. Match provider; all locations.
Use individual procedures. Match location; all providers.
Use individual procedures. All locations and providers.
Individual procedures. Match provider and location. Include single procedure cases.
Individual procedures. Match provider; all locations. Include single procedure cases.
Individual procedures. Match location; all providers. Include single procedure cases.
Individual procedures. All locations and providers. Include single procedure cases.
Use times when performed with other procedures from preference cards.
Use times when performed as single procedures from preference cards.

columns.name: PAN1_PAN_DLFT_PAN_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there are multiple panels on this case.
entries: Match procedure combination, provider, and location.
Match procedure combination and provider; all locations.
Match procedure combination and location; all providers.
Match procedure combination; All locations and providers.
Match procedure combination, provider, and location. Include single panel cases.
Match procedure combination and provider; all locations. Include single panel cases.
Match procedure combination and location; all providers. Include single panel cases.
Match procedure combination; All locations and providers. Include single panel cases.
Use individual procedures. Match provider and location.
Use individual procedures. Match provider; all locations.
Use individual procedures. Match location; all providers.
Use individual procedures. All locations and providers.
Individual procedures. Match provider and location. Include single procedure cases.
Individual procedures. Match provider; all locations. Include single procedure cases.
Individual procedures. Match location; all providers. Include single procedure cases.
Individual procedures. All locations and providers. Include single procedure cases.
Use times when performed with other procedures from preference cards.
Use times when performed as single procedures from preference cards.

columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there is only a single procedure in this panel.

columns.name: PAN2_PAN_DLFT_MLT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there are multiple procedures on this panel.

columns.name: PAN2_PAN_DLFT_PAN_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there are multiple panels on this case.

columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there is only a single procedure in this panel.

columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there are multiple panels on this case.

columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there is only a single procedure in this panel.

columns.name: PAN4_PAN_DLFT_MLT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there are multiple procedures on this panel.

columns.name: PAN4_PAN_DLFT_PAN_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there are multiple panels on this case.

columns.name: PAN5_PAN_DLFT_SNG_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there is only a single procedure in this panel.

columns.name: PAN5_PAN_DLFT_MLT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there are multiple procedures on this panel.

columns.name: PAN5_PAN_DLFT_PAN_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the defaulting method used for generating procedure time estimates for this panel when there are multiple panels on this case.

columns.name: PAN1_REQ_PROC_MINS
columns.description: This item holds the requested total number of minutes for all the procedures in a panel.

columns.name: PAN2_REQ_PROC_MINS
columns.description: This item holds the requested total number of minutes for all the procedures in a panel.

columns.description: This item holds the requested total number of minutes for all the procedures in a panel.

columns.name: PAN5_REQ_PROC_MINS
columns.description: This item holds the requested total number of minutes for all the procedures in a panel.

columns.name: PAN1_REQ_PROC_CMTS
columns.description: This item holds the comments regarding the requested total procedure length in minutes.

columns.name: PAN1_REQ_PROC_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the action taken in regards to the requested total procedure length in minutes for this panel.
entries: No Action
Accepted
Rejected
Automatically Used

columns.name: PAN2_REQ_PROC_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the action taken in regards to the requested total procedure length in minutes for this panel.

columns.name: PAN1_PANEL_CONFIDENCE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the confidence in Epic's estimated panel length for panel 1
entries: No Data
Modified
Low Confidence
Medium Confidence
High Confidence
Low - Preference Card
Low - Individual Procedures
Low - No Cases
Low - High Variability
Low - Few Stored Cases
Low - Possible Procedures
Medium - Moderate Variability
High - Low Variability

columns.name: PAN2_PANEL_CONFIDENCE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the confidence in Epic's estimated panel length for panel 2

columns.name: PAN3_PANEL_CONFIDENCE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the confidence in Epic's estimated panel length for panel 3

columns.name: PAN5_PANEL_CONFIDENCE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the confidence in Epic's estimated panel length for panel 5

columns.name: PAT_CONF_CASE_YN
columns.description: Whether the patient confirmed their case or not. Set to Yes by 2-way text confirmation or by OR staff.

columns.name: CASE_CONF_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The most recent instant of a patient's case confirmation. Part of the patient case confirmation workflow. Updated each time the patient confirms and reset to null when case is rescheduled to different date or OR location.

columns.name: CASE_CONF_PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient ID of the patient if they texted to confirm their own case.

columns.name: CONF_PAT_RELATIONSHIP_ID
columns.description: The Guardian (RLA networked ID) that confirmed the patient's case through text.

columns.name: CASE_CONF_USER_ID
columns.description: The employee ID (EMP networked) that confirmed the patient's case.

columns.name: CASE_CONF_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: PAN1_TOTAL_PROC_MIN
columns.description: The total number of minutes required for all of the procedures on this panel.

columns.name: PAN1_DFLT_PROC_MINS
columns.description: The total number of minutes required for all of the procedures on this panel as calculated by the system using procedure length estimates, preference cards, and procedure records.

columns.name: PAN1_PROC_MIN_MOD_YN
columns.description: Whether the total number of minutes required for all of the procedures on this panel has been modified from the defaulted value calculated by the system. This does not track whether the lengths of any of the individual procedures on the panel have been modified.

columns.name: PAN1_PROC_START
columns.description: The time at which this panel's procedures should begin. This is measured in minutes relative to the beginning of the case.

columns.name: PAN1_PRC_STRT_MOD_YN
columns.description: Whether the time at which this panel's procedures should begin has been manually edited by a user.

columns.name: PAN1_REQ_MINS_USER_ID
columns.description: The id of the user who requested a total procedure length for this panel in minutes.

columns.name: PAN1_REQ_MINS_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
